title: Emmerdale spoilers: Rebecca Sarker hints at Christmas storyline
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Recent Emmerdale scenes saw Manpreet Sharma steal her dead patient Derek’s stamp collection and sell it on for cash. And now it seems like the ruthless doctor’s crime will escape completely unnoticed this year as actress Rebecca Sarker revealed her Christmas scripts have no signs of her sticky fingers.

Speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk on the Inside Soap Awards red carpet, Rebecca told us: ‘I’ve got a feeling that she might have got away with it, I really do.

‘I’ve got new scripts coming through and starting to film and I know I’m in one of the Christmas stories but there’s no hint of it.

‘She’s either gotten away with it or it’s going to rear its ugly head [next year].’

Manpreet stole from Derek after he died (Picture: ITV)

We know that secrets never stay buried in soapland though, so we won’t be too surprised if it all catches up with her in 2020.

Teasing what’s in store over the festive period, Rebecca continued: ‘All the scripts are hot off the press and I’ve literally just got them through the post so I don’t know if I can say much, but it is a fun storyline.’

Hooray, we need some Christmas cheer in the Dales to look forward to what with Robert Sugden (Ryan Hawley) and Aaron Dingle (Danny Miller) fleeing the village and Moira Barton’s (Natalie J Robb) affair.
